name: Lister
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: add item
des: you are working in your kitchen and see you are out of salt or some vegetables, just say Alexa add salt. You go to fridge and see juice is missing, just say add juice. While doing office work, you are out of paper, just say add paper. Now before shopping, ask Alexa, my list and you would get a consolidated list.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
